channel.title: Need help with a few things
channel.description: Okay, I have some glitches in my server and i need someone to help me fix them here are the ones i need fixed [IMG]http://i957.photobucket.com/albums/ae57/Oreoscape/glitch2.jpg[/img] I want the mask on the head not the sword. [IMG]http://i957.photobucket.com/albums/ae57/Oreoscape/glitchone.jpg[/img] when ever i wear dragon platebody the hands go way back behind the player --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Come on reply!! it's been 10hours+ and only 12 views!!!
